alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Elmore County through 830 AM CDT... At 745 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deatsville, or near Millbrook, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millbrook, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Eclectic, Santuck, Titus, Ten Cedar Estates, Dexter, Weoka Mills, Jordan Lake, Kowaliga Bridge, Southern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Blue Ridge, Wetumpka Municipal Airport, Central and Wallsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for east central Alabama.
